title: San Francisco Arts Commission Grants FY2004-2016
description: Grants made by the San Francisco Arts Commission (SFAC) to individual artists, arts organizations and Cultural Centers from the Cultural Equity Endowment fund between Fiscal Year 2004 and 2016. http://administrative.sanfranciscocode.org/68/

columns.name: Name of Applicant
columns.description: Name of the Organization, Project, or Artist applying for the grant.

columns.name: Grant Category
columns.description: Certain grant categories are specified by the Cultural Equity Endowment legislation (CEI L1, CEI L2, IAC, CRSP, and OPG) while others are determined by the Arts Commission according to the need of the community and funding sources. All grants are administered by the Arts Commission - See http://administrative.sanfranciscocode.org/68/ for the legislation & http://www.sfartscommission.org/CAE/grants-2/grant-programs-and-applications/ for descriptions of the current grant programs. See the data dictionary attached to this dataset for the category names.

columns.name: Grant Fiscal Year
columns.description: The fiscal year the grant was awarded. City fiscal years start on July 1 of each calendar year and span to the next year. Fiscal years are specified by the later date in their range. For example FY 2013-2014 will be specified in the data as 2014.

columns.name: Community Focus Combined
columns.description: The community served as specified by the grant applicant. Community focus is set out in the legislation under admin code 68.4 http://administrative.sanfranciscocode.org/68/68.4/ These are not mandatory across all grants. This field combines all categories into a single field. For discrete categories, see the individual columns for each community focus area in the dataset.

columns.name: Community Focus: African American
columns.description: True or false field if the applicant specified this community focus in their application.

columns.name: Community Focus: Asian American
columns.description: True or false field if the applicant specified this community focus in their application.

columns.name: Community Focus: Disabled
columns.description: True or false field if the applicant specified this community focus in their application.

columns.name: Community Focus: Immigrant
columns.description: True or false field if the applicant specified this community focus in their application.

columns.name: Community Focus: L/G/B/T/Q
columns.description: True or false field if the applicant specified this community focus in their application.

columns.name: Community Focus: Latino American
columns.description: True or false field if the applicant specified this community focus in their application.

columns.name: Community Focus: Multiple People of Color
columns.description: True or false field if the applicant specified this community focus in their application.

columns.name: Community Focus: Native
columns.description: True or false field if the applicant specified this community focus in their application.

columns.name: Community Focus: Native American
columns.description: True or false field if the applicant specified this community focus in their application.

columns.name: Community Focus: Pacific Islander
columns.description: True or false field if the applicant specified this community focus in their application.

columns.name: Community Focus: Transgender
columns.description: True or false field if the applicant specified this community focus in their application.

columns.name: Community Focus: Women
columns.description: True or false field if the applicant specified this community focus in their application.

columns.name: Community Focus: No specified focus
columns.description: If the applicant did not specify any community focus area, then this field is marked true. This should only be true when all other community focus fields are false.
